DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validate characterize phenotype diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) progression base available clinical data ( demographic , systemic ophthalmic data ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim validate characterize phenotype diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) progression use ophthalmic systemic data type-2 diabetic subject follow AIBILI Clinical Trial Center last 10 year . Macular Edema ( ME ) development study period , mainly Clinically Significant ME ( CSME ) need treatment , primary indicator DR progression . CSME consider primary end-point use identify phenotype ( risk marker ) DR progression .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis DR . Females Males ; Age 18 year ; Signed Informed Consent ; Previous followup regular systemic ophthalmic assessment . Cataract eye disease may interfere fundus examination ; Vitreous syneresis posterior vitreous detachment ; Dilatation pupil < 5 mm .
